is a singleton

Returns I/O wait time counter.

double stxxl::stats::get_pio_time (   )  [inline]
 

Returns time spent in I/O (parallel I/O time).

Remarks:
If there are n any requests that are served simultaneously

in 1 second then the counter corresponding to the function increments by 1 second

Returns:
seconds spent in I/O
